title: Unbeatable
overview: With great talent in the world of business, Xu Ran is the standard picture of a successful businessman, enjoying the luxuriousness of wealth at the summit of his career. Tang Qi Qi is a normal white collar female worker, living a life filled with trivial matters and unrealistic dreams. Feng Lu Fei is from a rich family, depending on her own skills to create her own world-three parallel lives intertwined with each other by chance. Who will the Prince turned Frog choose? The cute Cinderella or the beautiful princess? Police officer Wei Xiao is Xu Ran's best buddy; yet is always on bad terms with Xu Ran's subordinate,Ye Rou. What twists and turns will happen to them? On the otherhand, the Union, an international giant finance company, with spokewoman Xiong Jia Jie is slowly extending their dark hands towards them.
